home.aboutMeText: Developer working for {experienceYears} years in the market, specialized in modern javascript applications and currently positioned as full stack developer.
home.historyText: Graduated in graphic design in 2015, my ambition to create didn't stop there. I ended up finding myself as a developer in the midst of the job market and decided to specialize. Today I can't imagine myself out of this world.
home.hobbiesText: Among my favorite hobbies to enjoy in my spare time I definitely can say that's listening to music, illustrating and reading manga!

experiences.hero99Tests: Driving Quality with Effective Testing: Responsible for conducting unit tests written in Jest, ensuring code quality and robustness, contributing to the delivery of highly reliable products.
experiences.hero99Mobile: Navigating the Mobile Universe: Responsible for mobile app development using React Native, bringing creative ideas to life and ensuring exceptional experiences for users.
experiences.hero99Social: Social Network for Artists: Creating and maintaining a social network for theater artists using cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, and NestJS to provide a dynamic platform for meaningful interactions.
experiences.freelancerWeb: Interactive and Intuitive Screens: Expertise in web application development with React, creating engaging and functional interfaces that captivate users and make the online experience unique.
experiences.freelancerMobile: Mobility Under Control: Developing mobile applications with React Native, offering versatile and accessible solutions that allow users to interact effectively, regardless of the device.
experiences.freelancerFigma: Visualizing the Future with Figma Prototypes: Transforming ideas into reality through prototype construction in Figma, allowing a tangible preview of design and functionality before implementation.
experiences.octoXBSearch: Maximizing Search Efficiency: Creating and optimizing a product indexer for Elastic Search, providing a fast and accurate search experience for users, enhancing website usability.
experiences.octoXBEcommerce: Elevating Ecommerce Aesthetics: Developing an appealing theme for Magento e-commerce using Knockout.js, combining aesthetics and functionality to ensure an engaging shopping experience.
experiences.octoXBMaintenance: Maintenance and Optimization: Engaging in ongoing maintenance of an e-commerce platform on Magento, ensuring seamless operation and exploring opportunities for continuous improvement.
experiences.octoXBMarketing: Strategic Alignment with Marketing: Collaborating with the marketing team to optimize e-commerce with online sales practices, ensuring that the website aligns with the latest market strategies and trends.
experiences.agenciaMagentoThemes: Design and Theme Implementation: Developing custom themes for the Magento e-commerce platform according to client needs, from layout conception to code implementation.
experiences.agenciaMagentoUX: Enhancing User Experience: Prioritizing user experience (UX) by creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces to ensure that visitors have an easy and enjoyable shopping journey.
experiences.agenciaMagentoCollaboration: Closely Collaborating with Clients: Collaborating with clients to understand their goals and specific requirements. This involved regular meetings, design discussions, and iterations to ensure that the themes met their expectations and business objectives.

react.description: Apps built with React and SEO friendly using NextJS
react.projectsTotemDescription: With the need to create a self-service point for customers, an application was designed to run on an interactive display.
react.projectsCabinDescription: UTFPR research project in partnership with ICI from Curitiba, aiming at the creation of medical cabins for public health care.
react.projectsTotemAboutText: Grupo Risotol√¢ndia has a food ordering app and had to install self-service points in some establishments that offer the service. The project included the development of the interface and its usability, and the implementation of its functionalities.
react.projectsTotemHowWasItDoneText: It was built using React in typescript, with Redux to control application state. And the styling of the components is done with emotion.
react.projectsCabinAboutText: The Maria project is the first medical cabin prototype for telemedicine use in Brazil. Its objective is to bring quality basic health care to remote areas (rural, interior, northeast, border) where there is a shortage of doctors or difficulties in the performance of the unified health system (SUS). In short, the cabin replaces a health post and brings a virtual doctor to the community. The project is a partnership between UTFPR & ICI
react.projectsCabinHowWasItDoneText:
It was built using React and NextJS in typescript, with Redux to control the application state. And the styling of the components is done with emotion.



Makes use of websockets for exchanging messages and other functionality using Socket.IO. And for real-time communication, WebRTC is used.



And MongoDB as database.

reactnative.projectsCustomerDescription: Aiming at ecommerce customer loyalty, the app offers a scoring system and access to account information.
reactnative.projectsCustomerAboutText: Morifarma needed an app aimed at its ecommerce customers, with functionalities to check the status of their orders, update informations and also to participate in the store's scoring program, where they can convert their acquired points into gift cards.
reactnative.projectsCustomerHowWasItDoneText: It was built using React Native in typescript, using the Expo framework, with Redux to control the application state. And the styling of the components is done with styled components.
